meanings.definition: Relating to a period of 200 years.
meanings.sent1: The bicentenary celebration was a grand event with historical displays.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed artifacts from the bicentenary period.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see how technology has changed over a bicentenary.
meanings.sent4: The bicentenary milestone marked a significant point in history.
meanings.sent5: The bicentenary era was filled with remarkable advancements.

meanings.sent1: The town celebrated its bicentenary with a parade and fireworks.
meanings.sent2: The bicentenary of the school was a special occasion for alumni.
meanings.sent3: The bicentenary cake was so big, it took hours to cut!
meanings.sent4: The bicentenary of the nation symbolized unity and progress.
meanings.sent5: Attending the bicentenary ceremony was a memorable experience.
